title: The Agentic Shift: Architecting the New UI Paradigm

cover.title: The Rise of Localhost Agents and Multi-Model Orchestration
cover.summary: Todayâ€™s curation highlights a fundamental shift from 'AI as a chatbot' to 'AI as an infrastructure.' With the launch of GPT-5.2's reasoning variants, Google's LiteRT for edge intelligence, and Figma's AI-to-Code pipeline, the industry is moving toward autonomous, verifiable workflows and intent-based user interfaces.

articles.title: OpenAI Releases GPT-5.2-Codex: The Era of Autonomous Engineering
articles.shortDescription: A specialized reasoning model designed for multi-step autonomous system refactoring and agentic coding.
articles.fullSummary: OpenAI has officially launched GPT-5.2-Codex, moving beyond code suggestions to 'agentic' actions. The model features 'Context Compaction,' allowing it to maintain an internal map of massive codebases while performing autonomous project migrations and refactors across live system environments.

articles.title: Figma Sites & CMS: Real-Time Deployment from Design
articles.shortDescription: Figma expands its AI suite to allow designers to publish live, content-driven websites directly from the canvas.
articles.fullSummary: Figma has transitioned to a live publishing platform with 'Figma Sites' and a native CMS. Leveraging Gemini 3 Pro integration, designers can now generate brand-aware UI variations and link live Jira/Notion data directly into prototypes, effectively collapsing the bridge between design and production.

articles.title: Google LiteRT: 100x Speedup for On-Device Multimodal AI
articles.shortDescription: Google's rebranded LiteRT (formerly TFLite) achieves massive performance gains on mobile NPUs.
articles.fullSummary: Google has announced a major upgrade to LiteRT, providing direct access to Snapdragon NPUs for 100x faster execution than CPUs. This allows for real-time, on-device scene understanding and vision-language models (VLM) with a time-to-first-token of just 0.12 seconds, enabling zero-latency AI UX.

articles.title: Microsoft 365 Integrates GPT-5.2 for Enterprise SMBs
articles.shortDescription: Copilot Studio and M365 Business gain immediate access to the high-reasoning GPT-5.2 'Thinking' tier.
articles.fullSummary: Microsoft has integrated the newly released GPT-5.2 tiers into its SMB offerings, aiming to democratize high-level reasoning for smaller firms. This allows PMs to use 'Copilot Studio' to build custom agentic workflows that handle spreadsheet creation and complex document analysis with human-level accuracy.

articles.title: The Rise of 'Vibe Coding' and Agentic CLI Standards
articles.shortDescription: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) and agentic CLIs are redefining how developers interact with LLMs.
articles.fullSummary: As we head into 2026, the industry is standardizing around MCP (Model Context Protocol) to unify how AI agents access data. This has birthed 'Vibe Coding,' where engineers focus on high-level intent and orchestration via agentic CLIs rather than writing repetitive boilerplate.
